title: B'harnii
wikitext:
'''B'harnii'''
'''Attribute Dice''': 12D
'''Dexterity '''2D+2/4D+2
'''Knowledge '''2D/4D
'''Mechanical '''1D+2/3D+2
'''Percetion '''2D+2/4D+2
'''Strength '''1D/3D
'''Technical '''2D/4D '''Size''': 1.5-2.0 meters
'''Move''': 10/12 '''Special abilities: ''' *'''Singing/dancing''': B'harnii are notorious for their ability to captivate children through singing and dancing. *'''Persuasion/Con''': B'harnii get a +2D to any attempt to get and hold the attention of a child using persuasion skill or to con a child. Adult characters get a +1D to resist such attempts, and are usually annoyed by them. *'''Blaster-Bolt Magnet''': If a B'harnii is in or near a group exchanging blaster fire, random blaster fire has a significantly increased chance to hit a B'harnii. '''Story Factors: ''' *'''Enslavement by the Empire''': Like Mon Calamari and Wookiees, B'harnii have been enslaved by the Empire; to teach kids that Imperial Authority Is A Good Thing, and Stormtroopers Are Your Special Friends. Of course, the Empire brainwashes the B'harnii before turning them loose to teach children. *'''The Jihad''': A few see B'harnii as spawn of evil due to their ability to influence the minds of the young, and to that end have formed a secret organization, the Jihad, to eradicate all B'harnii through genocide. *'''Child Loyalty''': B'harnii have +2D to any attempt to Command a child. *'''Teaching''': B'harnii make excellent teachers for children. Kids learn twice as fast from B'harnii. *Player-characters cannot start with the [[Kid]] template. '''Description''': B'harnii (singular and plural are the same word) are native to "The Hole," a terrestrial world in the contested Valar Cluster. B'harnii are bipedal, bilaterally-symmetrical reptilian creatures, purple in color, with ample flesh, a large tail and soft, velour-like skin. B'harnii are capable of speaking Basic and of Force-use. '''Source''': *Unknown (possibly a home brew race)
